name: Hide 'N Seek!: Foes DLC
summary: Embrace the eerie atmosphere of Halloween with the Spooky Season DLC, unlocking an array of thrilling new content to elevate your gaming experience. Adorn your character in 8 chilling skins, personalize your adventure with 4 wolf-themed pets, and ensure you have the resources to fully customize your spooky setup with 5,000 extra in-game coins.
